pages.text: $(o)A momentous scientific achievement, you've found the perfect setup for smelting not ore into ingots, but ores and various materials into other ores! With this magnificant alloy furnace, you can create more powerful ingots to craft tools from, and possibly aid in harnessing the power of the my'ri.
The alloy furnace works much like a normal furnace, except with three inputs instead of one. Any normal fuel source can power it, and ingredients can be place in any arrangment.
